interactivity.requirements: Sunday You must be on at least Day  102  to unlock this Event. You must have seen or permanently missed the following Events: Seen Main Events up to " Recall " Seen " Takoyaki " from Maya Makinami Seen " ?? " Seen " ???? "
interactivity.to_get_this_event: Upon fulfilling all Requirements, this Event automatically occurs on the first Sunday on or after Day 102.

progression.synopsis: An origin story is for the universe is set out, in which a ball of light called Nozomu (later called God) creates humanity out of loneliness. Since God is dead, however, a new, better world must be written. Sensei supposedly wakes up to find Maya giving him a handjob. He feels like he is dying, like the "wires of his brain" are being wrapped around one another. He decides that Maya must be a dream, but that it wouldn't hurt to play along. He wakes up a few hours later, but it seems that the world is broken .
trivia: If Sensei hasn't seen Nightvision , triggering this Event will fail V !

changelog: This Event was added in Update 0.5.
